oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Bean Blossom Bluegrass Festival - various artists - 1969-06-29 - part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Various performances from the Bean Blossom Bluegrass Festival, located in Bean Blossom, Indiana, featuring Bill Monroe (performer) and his Bluegrass Boys, Jim Monroe, Rual Yarbrough, Kenny Baker, Doug Green and Tex Logan, Jimmy Martin (performer), and the Sunny Mountain Boys, Vernon Derrick, Chris Warner, and Doug Green, and Gloria Belle (performer). Recorded on June 29, 1969.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Bill Monroe; Bluegrass Boys; Jimmy Martin; Sunny Mountain Boys; Gloria Belle
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Watermelon On The Vine (Bill Monroe and his Bluegrass Boys) -- (00:40) Louisville Breakdown (Bill Monroe and his Bluegrass Boys) -- (03:20) What About You (Bill Monroe and his Bluegrass Boys) -- (05:47) Cumberland Gap (Bill Monroe and his Bluegrass Boys) -- (07:48) Used To Be (Bill Monroe and his Bluegrass Boys) -- (09:40) Dusty Miller (Bill Monroe and his Bluegrass Boys) -- (14:17) I Saw The Light (Bill Monroe and his Bluegrass Boys) -- (16:57) Buckin' Mule (Bill Monroe and his Bluegrass Boys) -- (20:50) Clinch Mountain Backstep (Bill Monroe and his Bluegrass Boys) -- (24:50) Live And Let Live (Bill Monroe and his Bluegrass Boys) -- (27:28) Y'all Come (Bill Monroe and his Bluegrass Boys) -- (28:20) Footprints In The Snow (Bill Monroe and his Bluegrass Boys) -- (30:46) Fire On The Mountain (Jimmy Martin and the Sunny Mountain Boys) -- (31:33) Tennessee (Jimmy Martin and the Sunny Mountain Boys) -- (34:20) Train 45 (Jimmy Martin and the Sunny Mountain Boys) -- (36:14) Traveling The Highway Home (Gloria Belle, Jimmy Martin and the Sunny Mountain Boys) -- (38:33) Sunny Side Of The Mountain (Jimmy Martin and the Sunny Mountain Boys) -- (41:19) Milwaukee Here I Come (Jimmy Martin and the Sunny Side Of The Mountain) -- (43:27) Orange Blossom Special (Jimmy Martin and the Sunny Mountain Boys) -- (45:35) Little White Church (Jimmy Martin and the Sunny Mountain Boys) -- (47:57) Sophronie (Jimmy Martin and the Sunny Mountain Boys) -- (50:00) Doin' My Time (Jimmy Martin and the Sunny Mountain Boys) -- (54:04) Freeborn Man (Jimmy Martin and the Sunny Mountain Boys) -- (56:54) Theme Time (Jimmy Martin and the Sunny Mountain Boys) -- (58:10) My Heart Won't Let Me Forget (Gloria Belle, Jimmy Martin and the Sunny Mountain Boys) -- (1:00:41) Martin thanks Gloria Belle and takes requests from the audience -- [Unidentified] does a Bugs Bunny impression -- (1:02:37) Country Music Is Here To Stay) (Simon Crum) (incomplete)
